module: Module-level comment: The `tb_sdram_a_ref` testbench module simulates SDRAM initialization and refresh cycles. It uses internal clock generation (clk_gen), SDRAM command sequencing (`sdram_init` and `sdram_a_ref`), and signals (`aref_en`, `sdram_cmd`, `sdram_ba`, `sdram_addr`) to interface with a model SDRAM (`sdram_model_plus`). This setup ensures correct timing and functional behavior of SDRAM under test scenarios.
